timeline.message: Add nested group functionality to timeline component

timeline.body: This should just be Set and not HashSet.  That way someone could use a TreeSet or any other kind of Set they want.
timeline.bodyText: This should just be Set and not HashSet.  That way someone could use a TreeSet or any other kind of Set they want.
timeline.bodyHTML: This should just be Set and not HashSet. That way someone could use a TreeSet or any other kind of Set they want.
timeline.author: melloware

      */
     private String title;
 
+    /**
+     * root level of the nested groups.
+     */
+    private Integer treeLevel;
+
+    /**
+     *
+     * it is a set of ids of nested groups that a group or nested group contains.
+     */
+    private HashSet<String> nestedGroups;

timeline.bodyHTML:
Set<String> nestedGroups = group.getNestedGroup();
if (nestedGroups  != null && !nestedGroups.isEmpty()) {
